ack.p: We appreciate Cordelle Lazare (Huazhong University of Science and Technology), and Rajluxmee Beejadhursing (Huazhong University of Science and Technology) for their contributions in manuscript editing.

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: This work was supported by Natural Science Foundation of China (81630060, 81772775), National Basic Research Program (973 Program) from Ministry of Science and Technology of the People's Republic of China (2015CB553903), and the research-oriented clinician funding program of Tongji Medical College, Huazhong University of Science and Technology. The funders played no role in the study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.

sec.title: Contributors
sec.p: Peng Wu, Yi Wang and Yifan Meng conceived and designed the study; Yi Wang and Wending Li performed the statistical analysis; Yifan Meng, Yi Wang and Wending Li drafted the article; Xiaofei Zhang, Zaixing Deng, Mengjun Hu, Pingrong Shen, Shengfeng Xu, Chenglin Fu, Wen Jiang, Bing Wu, Kezhen Li, Ling Xi, Ding Ma, Xing Xie, Junbo Hu, Xiaodong Cheng contributed to the data collection and quality control; Peng Wu made the critical revision of the manuscript. All authors gave their comments on the article and approved the final version before submission.
